thread.title: Spring time in New York -
thread.title_full: Spring time in New York - Review of 6 Columbus - A SIXTY Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maeve S
title: Spring time in New York -
text: This hotel was great. Very reasonable for New York. The staff said all the right things but didn't totally deliver. They were very friendly though. The location was ideal. Just on the corner of central park and a short walk down to Time Square. And there's a subway station right outside. The rooms are spotless with a decent size bathroom and room.
